|Type

|HQDM_spatio_temporal_extent

|http://ontology.asam.net/ontologies/OpenXOntologyHQDM.owl#HQDM_spatio_temporal_extent

|Subclass of

|Restriction
|HQDM_ending **exactly** **1** HQDM_event

|Restriction
|HQDM_member_of **only** HQDM_class_of_spatio_temporal_extent

|Restriction
|HQDM_beginning **exactly** **1** HQDM_event

|Restriction
|HQDM_part_of **some** HQDM_possible_world

|Comment
|from text 11.2: A spatio_temporal_extent may be part of one or more other spatio_temporal_extent. A spatio_temporal_extent may be part of one or more possible_world. In fact it must be part of a possible_world, unless it is a possible_world.
so actually "part_of some possible_world" is actually incorrect
